reviewtext: This is advertised as a five port switch.  However, one of the ports is used to connect to the modem.  As a result, you are left with only four usable ports.  I had another product previously that I replaced after three years.  It was a five port switch but it had another port to connect the modem so it had five usable ports.  This is what I thought I was buying based on the description.  The device works fine and is a good product.  If you need all five ports, you should get another product.
